mapper.select: select u.id as userId, u.username, u.password, u.age, u.sex, u.signature, u.profile_photo, u.phone, u.email, u.state, i.id as roleId, i.name FROM user u left join user_identity ui on u.id = ui.user_id left join identity i on ui.identity_id = i.id where username = #{name} and u.state = 0

update.if: update user set user.sum_followed = user.sum_followed+1 where user.id=#{followed_id}
update user set user.sum_followed = user.sum_followed-1 where user.id=#{followed_id}
update user set user.sum_following = user.sum_following+1 where user.id=#{following_id}
update user set user.sum_following = user.sum_following-1 where user.id=#{following_id}

mapper.update: update user u set u.username=#{user.username}, u.age=#{user.age}, u.sex=#{user.sex}, u.signature=#{user.signature}, u.profile_photo=#{user.profilePhoto}, u.phone=#{user.phone}, u.email=#{user.email}, u.state=#{user.state}, u.sum_followed=#{user.sumFollowed}, u.sum_following =#{user.sumFollowing} where u.id = #{user.id}
